name: Ashab-e-Kahf
description: A drama based on the story of the Seven Sleepers of Ephesus.

name: Mera Saaein
description: A series about the political and personal struggles of a man named Saaein.

name: The Message
description: A historical film about the life of the Prophet Muhammad.

name: Diriliş: Ertuğrul
description: The story of Ertuğrul Bey and the founding of the Ottoman Empire.

name: Aşk-ı Memnu
description: A romantic drama series based on a classic Turkish novel.

name: Omar
description: The story of the life of Omar ibn Khattab, the second caliph of the Islamic Caliphate.
